column6: "POWER," PART 5 T'Challa prepares his Dora Milaje army to fight an unwinnable war, Storm battles an unstoppable and unnatural destructive force, and the new Black Panther wages war against an unbeatable foe: Prince Namor, the Sub-Mariner!  Guest-starring the Fantastic Four! Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Ken Lashley | penciller:Paul Renaud | writer:Jonathan Maberry | inker:Paul Neary | letterer:Cory Petit
